text: United Nations General Assembly Resolution 217A was adopted on December 10, 1948, to ratify the Universal Declaration of Human Rights. The resolution was adopted by a majority of 48 countries from among the 58 members of the United Nations at that time; however 8 abstained and the Republic of Honduras and the Mutawakkilite Kingdom of Yemen did not vote. == Voting Results == The result of the voting was the following: {| class="sortable wikitable" |- |width="150" align="center" bgcolor="98FB98"|For |width="120" align="center"
